appletsCard.description: Add songs from videos you like to a Spotify playlist
appletsCard.howItWorks: This applet will search the title of the video on Spotify - if it finds the track, it'll add it to a 'Youtube' playlist. Not all songs on YouTube are available on Spotify. Happy tune hunting!

appletsCard.description: Save Gmail attachments to Google Drive
appletsCard.howItWorks: Whenever you receive an email with an attachment in Gmail, this applet will automatically save the file to your Google Drive. Keep your important files safe and accessible in the cloud.

appletsCard.description: Post new GitHub issues to a Discord channel
appletsCard.howItWorks: When a new issue is created on your GitHub repository, this applet will instantly send a message to your chosen Discord channel. Stay in sync with your team without leaving Discord.

appletsCard.description: Save liked YouTube videos to a Google Sheet
appletsCard.howItWorks: Each time you like a video on YouTube, this applet will log the video’s title, link, and other details into a Google Sheet. Build your own organized list of favorites effortlessly.

appletsCard.description: Notify Discord when a new Spotify playlist is created
appletsCard.howItWorks: Whenever you create a new playlist on Spotify, this applet will send a notification message to your Discord server. Share your music taste with friends as soon as you make a playlist.
